VisitTime.PluginDescription: Reports the local time and the server time when your visitors view your website or app.
VisitTime.WidgetByDayOfWeekDocumentation: This graph shows the number of sessions on your CDN on each day of the week.
VisitTime.WidgetLocalTimeDocumentation: This graph shows what time it was in the %1$s visitors' time zones %2$s during their sessions.
VisitTime.WidgetServerTimeDocumentation: This graph shows what time it was in the %1$s server's time zone %2$s during the sessions.
